objects.text: • ULTRA-HIGH SPEED SSD • 3D AUDIO • HAPTIC FEEDBACK

product_details.name: Sony PlayStation®5 Digital Edition (slim) Console Video Game
product_details.description:
- Play Like Never Before PlayStation5 Digital Edition The PS5 Digital Edition unleashes new gaming possibilities that you never anticipated.
- Experience lightning fast loading with an ultra-high speed SSD, deeper immersion with support for haptic feedback, adaptive triggers, and 3D Audio, and an all-new generation of incredible PlayStation games.
- PS5 Digital Edition is an all-digital version of the PS5 console with no disc drive.
- Sign into your account for PlayStationNetwork and go to PlayStationStore to buy and download games.
- Lightning Speed: Harness the power of a custom CPU, GPU, and SSD with Integrated I/O that rewrite the rules of what a PlayStation console can do.
- Stunning Games: Marvel at incredible graphics and experience new PS5 features.
- Play a back catalog of supported PS4 games.
- Breathtaking Immersion: Discover a deeper gaming experience with support for haptic feedback, adaptive triggers, and 3D Audio technology.
- Vertical stand sold separately. *PS5 Digital Edition (CFI-2000 model group slim) Account for PlayStationNetwork required.
- Full terms apply playstation.com/PSNTerms . 3D audio via built-in TV speakers or analog/USB stereo headphones.
- Set up and latest system software update required.

banner_details:
This banner showcases a modern and striking promotional layout centered around a gaming console product. The background uses a dynamic radial gradient ranging from bright royal blue to deep navy, enhanced by subtle line and circle graphics for depth and motion. A large circular gradient in the center frames the featured product image ("product_image"), creating a focal point. Above it, bold uppercase text layers for the product title ("heading") and edition label ("subheading") establish hierarchy and grab attention. A pricing bubble ("price") stands out to the right, overlaid on a circular gradient shape. At the bottom, a clean descriptive line ("description") lists features, while a white rounded rectangle ("cta_background") hosts a vibrant call-to-action button ("cta"). The minimalist tech-inspired aesthetic is supported by geometric fonts and clean alignment.

**Color Palette:**
- Royal Blue (#0072CE)
- Deep Navy (#00205B)
- Light Gray (#E0E0E0)
- White (#FFFFFF)
product_color: The product image of the PlayStation 5 Digital Edition utilizes a sleek and modern color palette to convey a sense of innovation and sophistication. Dominant colors include a crisp white (#FFFFFF) used for the console casing and controller, a deep black (#000000) serving as the box background and part of the console, and a cool blue (#1F3A93) accentuating edges and logos. The colors are sharply contrasted to highlight the product’s futuristic design, while subtle gradients and reflections on the console enhance depth and dimensionality. Bright yellow (#FFD700) and green (#7AC943) rating labels add visual pop without clashing.
